div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1288 Pazarlik (anc. Kastabos), Caria, 1960 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (Price) Contents: 4 AR, 171 AE Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 AE Erythrae: 1 AE Rhodes: 4 AR, 169 AE Disposition: Izmir Price in Cook-Plommer, The Sanctuary of Hemithea at Kastabos (Cambridge, 1966), pp. 68-71, illus.
